com.example.rocketapp.controller

Class ForumManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.rocketapp.controller.ForumManager

  • public class ForumManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles adding, retrieving, and modifying questions and answers for experiment experiment forums.

    • Method Detail

      • listen

        public static void listen(Experiment experiment,
                          ExperimentManager.ExperimentCallback onUpdate)
        Listens to firestore for changes to this experiment. You MUST use this to get the trials and questions for an experiment. You may want to update the UI in onUpdate.
        Parameters:
        experiment - The experiment to listen to.
        onUpdate - Callback for implementing desired behaviour when the experiment is updated in firestore.

      • addQuestion

        public static void addQuestion(Question question,
                               Experiment experiment,
                               Callback onSuccess,
                               ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Add a question to an experiment.
        Parameters:
        question - The question object
        experiment - The experiment to add the question to
        onSuccess - Callback for when push successful
        onFailure - Callback for when push fails

      • update

        public static void update(Question question,
                          Experiment experiment,
                          Callback onSuccess,
                          ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Update a question.
        Parameters:
        question - The question object
        experiment - The experiment the question belongs to
        onSuccess - Callback for when push successful
        onFailure - Callback for when push fails
